mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event (num, memberId, isEvent, subject, content, imageFilename, created) VALUES (#{num}, #{memberId}, #{isEvent}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{imageFilename}, #{created})
mapper.select: SELECT num, isEvent, subject, created FROM event WHERE isEvent=1 ORDER BY num DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE event SET isEvent=#{isEvent}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, imageFilename=#{imageFilename} WHERE num=#{num}
